column1: Funeral services will be conducted at 1:00 pm. Saturday
column3: 2015 at the Rowland H. Bailey Funeral Chapel of the Bailey-Kirk Funeral Home in Princeton with Rev. Fred Farley officiating. Entombment will follow at Roselawn Memorial Gardens in Princeton. Family will serve as pallbearers. Friends may visit with the family on Saturday
column4: June 13 from 12:00 p.m. until the service hour at Bailey-Kirk Funeral Home.
